page.title: 10Community Centre - Newburgh
page.content: The{Community Centre}is situated in the centre of Newburgh. It is open all week apart from weekends. It is sometimes open on a Saturday if there is a function to take place such as a coffee morning or a disco. The building is two storeys high. There are many rooms including a large hall and Cafeteria. The hall is used for all functions and clubs(Badminton, Health Club, Theatre Group and Mothers and Toddlers.) The cafeteria is open 5 days a week for teas, coffees and snacks. You can also buy ice lollies and ice cream. The{Community Centre}used to be called the{Institute,}until a few years ago when it got its present name. The office has up to date, modern equipment. If you wish to have anything typed services are available.
